title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Creative Technology-Integrated Science Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening creative instructional design competencies using smartphones in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more science education project design frameworks based on constructivist principles
Learners develop one or more PBL science experiment simulation activities using smartphone-based tools
Learners provide three or more specific feedbacks on peers' projects through a peer coaching system
Learners write evaluation reports assessing their own instructional design process from two or more perspectives through reflective practice

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
